long_description: The Ergon GP1 Bike Grips offer comfort and support under your palms when mountain biking, commuting or just riding about. Ergon GP1 Bike Grips provide optimal pressure distribution under the palms; specific right and left design ensures proper support. Textured pads enhance grip and precision ergonomic fit increases control. Aluminum end clamps provide easy and secure installation.
short_description: The Ergon GP1 Bike Grips offer comfort and support under your palms when mountain biking, commuting or just riding about.
